remarks: The group of Dirichlet characters ` mod n ` is the set of monoid homomorphisms from ` ZZ / n ZZ ` to the multiplicative monoid of the complex numbers, equipped with the group operation of pointwise multiplication.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
